name: Astro Lords: Leader of production
detailed_description:
A CINEMATIC SPACE SHOOTER - WISHLIST NOW!



About the Game

Get a boost to your in-game development with the new "Leader of production" offer
This package will help you in the development of your asteroid.

The package includes officers that increase storage, ammo production rate, maximum factory order for your base. They can be applied not only to the captains, but also to the starbase.

Production Leader DLC includes:

Officers:
  • "Anton Pendyur" Silver The total limit of ammunition on the asteroid + 45%, The total limit of microchips on the asteroid + 45%
    "Arkady Kuchma" Silver Missile production speed + 30%, Laser production speed + 30%
    "Andrey Varnava" Silver The total limit of minibots on the asteroid + 20%, The maximum order at the Nano plant + 50%

Contracts:
  • 3 "Contracts" for 1 month

How to use the DLC:
  • After purchase, the DLC will appear in your library, to get it, you just need to enter the game
  • Your DLC will appear in the Advisor window, select it and press the button: Collect the reward
  • Enjoy your DLC!

Attention, important!

In order to use the DLC, you must have completed the Tutorial in the game.

short_description: DLC "Leader of production" for MMOG "Astro Lords"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP/Vista 7/8
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 256 Mb and higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: X 10.6.8
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2 GHZ Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or ATI Radeon x1950 256Mb and higher
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
